Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.config

Class GatherIgnoredFileNamesRuleProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ocpsoft.rewrite.context.ContextBase
      • org.jboss.windup.config.AbstractRuleProvider
        • org.jboss.windup.config.ruleprovider.IteratingRuleProvider<WindupConfigurationModel>
          • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.config.GatherIgnoredFileNamesRuleProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleProvider, org.ocpsoft.common.pattern.Specialized<Object>, org.ocpsoft.common.pattern.Weighted, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConfigurationProvider<RuleLoaderContext>, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.context.Context
    public class GatherIgnoredFileNamesRuleProvider
extends IteratingRuleProvider<WindupConfigurationModel>
    Read and add all the ignore regexes (when a file matches the regex, it will not be scanned by windup) that are present in the windup runtime.
    Author:
    Matej Briskar
